title: Ground News - On the Hatred of Jews
text:
Summary by Ground News Antisemitism is a denial of humanity of the Jew, says Rabbi David Silverman. He says Harvard is captured by an ideology that centers oppression. Silverman: Jews are far from being colonialists, but the Jews in Israel are quite diverse. Jews generate 0.2 percent of the world's population, he says, making outrage disproportionate.
